messages.subject: Reading!!!
messages.msgSnippet: OMG this is SO COOL! Sarah is working on reading a chapter book! We found this Brownie Girl Scout Book at the Treasure Chest one day awhile ago. We both
messages.messageBody:
OMG this is SO COOL!

Sarah is working on reading a chapter book! We found this "Brownie Girl Scout Book" at the Treasure Chest one day awhile ago. We both forgot about it, so I've not read it to her. She recently found it again, and today is working on reading it herself!! Her reading has really taken off lately, and I know finding books SHE'S interested in has really helped.

MamaBeth


Everything I need to know, I learned on my own!

---------------------------------
